ids_info.name: bremsstrahlung_visible
ids_info.description: Diagnostic for measuring the bremsstrahlung from thermal particules in the visible light range, in view of determining the effective charge of the plasma.

Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within bremsstrahlung_visible IDS: Diagnostic for measuring the bremsstrahlung from thermal particules in the visible light range, in view of determining the effective charge of the plasma. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within zeff_line_average container: Average effective charge along the line of sight.

Indicator of the validity of the data for the whole acquisition period. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity). Within bremsstrahlung_visible IDS: Diagnostic for measuring the bremsstrahlung from thermal particules in the visible light range, in view of determining the effective charge of the plasma. Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within zeff_line_average container: Average effective charge along the line of sight.

Within channel container: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera). Within zeff_line_average container: Average effective charge along the line of sight.
